snippet: Chicago was built by Theo Epstein, just as the Boston Red Sox, another hard-luck franchise, were in 2004. To win a title as that team did, the Cubs, too, will have to overcome extreme hardship.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column asserts that Chicago Cubs will have hard time winning National League Championship Series after falling three games to New York Mets; notes Boston Red Sox are only team in MLB history to win best-of-seven series after losing first three games.
lead_paragraph: Chicago was built by Theo Epstein, just as the Boston Red Sox, another hard-luck franchise, were in 2004. To win a title as that team did, the Cubs, too, will have to overcome extreme hardship.

headline.print_headline: Needing Help, Cubs Instead Revive Hard-Luck Past
headline.main: Needing Help, Cubs Instead Revive Hard-Luck Past
